    Modifier and Type Method Description

    This method creates a new student object and adds to student list

    This method takes in a Student object and checks whether the student exists in student list
    java.lang.Boolean CourseController.checkTotalAU​(Student student)
    This method takes in student object and checks whether the student exceed the maximum amount of AU for registration.
    void CourseController.deregisterCourse​(Student student, int index, java.lang.String courseCode)
    This method takes in student object, index number and course code, and de-registers student from the course.
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Course> CourseController.getRegisteredCourses​(Student student)
    This method takes in student object and return list of courses that the student registered.
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Course> CourseController.getWaitlistCourses​(Student student)
    This method takes in student object and return list of courses that the student is on wait list.
    void CourseController.registerCourse​(Student student, int index, java.lang.String courseCode)
    This method takes in student object, index number and course code, and registers student to the course.
